short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly close the new tab if you do not need it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When opening a new tab, if it is not the content you are interested in, you can quickly close it by going back. It is look like Safari.

Touchpad：Use the touchpad to quickly close the page by returning to the previous page.
Mouse：Use the mouse wheel to left-click to return to the previous page, and you can close the page you are not currently interested in. You can also customize your mouse buttons to trigger this action.
